title: Code Network Website
description: Website for Coding club Code Network using React, Vite, & Netlify. End-to-End Testing with Deploy Previews for PR's is used with Netlify

title: Terminal Auction House
description: OO C# terminal based auction program with 26 classes. Features user data storing, registration, login, data validation, selling, purchasing, bidding, and search filtering & features.

title: Python Sudoku Game
description: Python Sudoku game with unique grid generation algorithm. It generates a random Sudoku puzzle using a baseline valid solution, shuffles the rows, columns, and numbers to create a new puzzle, and then uses the backtracking algorithm to solve it. Includes multiple difficulties and live input solution checking.

title: Sustainability Map of Brisbane (In Progress)
technologies: Spring Boot | H2 | ReactJS | Github Actions
description: 2D Map provides an interactive platform in Brisbane City with accommodation, transportation, and disability accessibility data for 10-20 destinations. Users input location data to calculate a sustainability rating and receive a report on their carbon footprint. The algorithm generates alternative recommendations within a specified radius to reduce the trip's carbon footprint. Users can also view 360-degree images of locations.
